                                     User aUser)

        creates a Tag for a given TagSet. Combination of tag name and tagset name should be unique

      • createLayer

        @Transactional
public void createLayer(AnnotationLayer aLayer,
                                       User aUser)
                                throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: AnnotationService
        creates a type which will be a span, chain, or arc(relation) type. Currently the annotation types are highly highly tied with the tagsets, one tagset per type. POS, Names Entity, and coreference links are span types while coreference chains and dependency parsings are arc(relation) types.
        Specified by:
        createLayer in interface AnnotationService
        Parameters:
        aLayer - the type.
        aUser - the user.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

      • initializeTypesForProject

        @Transactional
public void initializeTypesForProject(Project aProject,
                                                     User aUser,
                                                     String[] aPostags,
                                                     String[] aPosTagDescriptions,
                                                     String[] aDepTags,
                                                     String[] aDepTagDescriptions,
                                                     String[] aNeTags,
                                                     String[] aNeTagDescriptions,
                                                     String[] aCorefTypeTags,
                                                     String[] aCorefRelTags)
                                              throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: AnnotationService
        Initialize the project with default AnnotationLayer, TagSets, and Tag s. This is done per Project. For older projects, this method is used to import old tagsets and convert to the new scheme.
        Specified by:
        initializeTypesForProject in interface AnnotationService
        Parameters:
        aProject - the project.
        aUser - the user.
        aPostags - the pos tags.
        aPosTagDescriptions - the pos-tag descriptions.
        aDepTags - the dep tags.
        aDepTagDescriptions - the dep-tag descriptions.
        aNeTags - the ne tags.
        aNeTagDescriptions - the ne-tag descriptions.
        aCorefTypeTags - the coref tags.
        aCorefRelTags - the relation tags.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
